Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The nineth sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The photographs show the South Vietnamese Liberation Front in action (training).The Mao quotation reads "Revolutionary warfare is mass warfare, only by mobilizing the masses one can wage war, only by depending on the masses one can wage war".
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
